about_the_game:
Additional hairstyle types, mustache and beard types and Accessory 1 & 2 types will become available for selection during custom character creation in "Edit Mode".

* Added Hairstyle Types
・ Male (36)
・ Female (36)

* Added Facial Hair Types
・ Mustaches (8)
・ Beards (8)

* Added Accessory 1 Types
Male (11)
Female (13)

* Added Accessory 2 Types
Male (23)
Female (28)

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.
detailed_description:
Additional hairstyle types, mustache and beard types and Accessory 1 & 2 types will become available for selection during custom character creation in "Edit Mode".

* Added Hairstyle Types
・ Male (36)
・ Female (36)

* Added Facial Hair Types
・ Mustaches (8)
・ Beards (8)

* Added Accessory 1 Types
Male (11)
Female (13)

* Added Accessory 2 Types
Male (23)
Female (28)

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core2 DUO 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 640*480 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core i7 860 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280*720 pixel over　※No 4K compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
